alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 5:22AM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Strong winds could also bring down tree branches as well as weak and dead trees resulting in scattered power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
